cmdcr 0.3.0

Reference

All functions

cal_mean()

Calculate the mean of the nearest N stations

cal_wind_direction()

Covert wind direction code into degrees based on the base direction.

combine_data()

Combine meteorological data into a single file.

combine_data_()

Combine meteorological data into a single file.

format_data()

Format the meteorological data.

get_data_type() get_data_date()

Get the type and date of the meteorological variable according to the file name.

get_nearest_station()

Get the nearest stations to the preferd station.

import_cmdc_data()

Import CMDC data

is_valid_fname()

Check the validity of the file name.

rbind_cmdc_data() merge_cmdc_data()

Combine cmdc data.table by rows or columns

read_data()

Read the meteorological data.

remove_missing_data()

Function to remove missing data in the data.table.

set_colnames()

Set column names for each dataset.
